values.code: RGBToHSV(red: Int, green: Int, blue: Int, hsv: FloatArray!)
values.desc: Convert RGB components to HSV.
Returns the value of the alpha component in the range \([0..1]\).
Returns the alpha component encoded in the specified color long.
Return the alpha component of a color int.

values.code: argb(alpha: Int, red: Int, green: Int, blue: Int)
values.desc: Return a color-int from alpha, red, green, blue components.

values.code: argb(alpha: Float, red: Float, green: Float, blue: Float)
values.desc: Return a color-int from alpha, red, green, blue float components in the range \([0..1]\).
Returns the value of the blue component in the range defined by this color's color space (see ColorSpace#getMinValue(int) and ColorSpace#getMaxValue(int)).
Returns the blue component encoded in the specified color long.
Return the blue component of a color int.
Returns the color space encoded in the specified color long.
Convert the ARGB color to its HSV components.
Converts this color from its color space to the specified color space.
Converts the specified ARGB color int from the ColorSpace.Named#SRGB color space into the specified destination color space.
Converts the specified color long from its color space into the specified destination color space.

values.code: convert(r: Float, g: Float, b: Float, a: Float, source: ColorSpace, destination: ColorSpace)
values.desc: Converts the specified 3 component color from the source color space to the destination color space.
Converts the specified color long from a color space to another using the specified color space ColorSpace.Connector.

values.code: convert(r: Float, g: Float, b: Float, a: Float, connector: ColorSpace.Connector)
values.desc: Converts the specified 3 component color from a color space to another using the specified color space ColorSpace.Connector.
Returns this color's color space.
Returns the value of the specified component in the range defined by this color's color space (see ColorSpace#getMinValue(int) and ColorSpace#getMaxValue(int)).
Returns the number of components that form a color value according to this color space's color model, plus one extra component for alpha.
Returns this color's components as a new array.
Copies this color's components in the supplied array.
Returns the color model of this color.
Returns the value of the green component in the range defined by this color's color space (see ColorSpace#getMinValue(int) and ColorSpace#getMaxValue(int)).
Returns the green component encoded in the specified color long.
Return the green component of a color int.
Indicates whether the specified color is in the specified color space.
Indicates whether this color is in the ColorSpace.Named#SRGB color space.
Indicates whether the specified color is in the ColorSpace.Named#SRGB color space.
Indicates whether this color color is in a wide-gamut color space.
Indicates whether the specified color is in a wide-gamut color space.
Returns the relative luminance of this color.
Returns the relative luminance of a color.
Returns the relative luminance of a color.
Packs this color into a color long.
Converts the specified ARGB color int to an RGBA color long in the sRGB color space.

values.code: pack(red: Float, green: Float, blue: Float)
values.desc: Packs the sRGB color defined by the specified red, green and blue component values into an RGBA color long in the sRGB color space.

values.code: pack(red: Float, green: Float, blue: Float, alpha: Float)
values.desc: Packs the sRGB color defined by the specified red, green, blue and alpha component values into an RGBA color long in the sRGB color space.

values.code: pack(red: Float, green: Float, blue: Float, alpha: Float, colorSpace: ColorSpace)
values.desc: Packs the 3 component color defined by the specified red, green, blue and alpha component values into a color long in the specified color space.
Parse the color string, and return the corresponding color-int.
Returns the value of the red component in the range defined by this color's color space (see ColorSpace#getMinValue(int) and ColorSpace#getMaxValue(int)).
Returns the red component encoded in the specified color long.
Return the red component of a color int.

values.code: rgb(red: Int, green: Int, blue: Int)
values.desc: Return a color-int from red, green, blue components.

values.code: rgb(red: Float, green: Float, blue: Float)
values.desc: Return a color-int from red, green, blue float components in the range \([0..1]\).
Converts this color to an ARGB color int.
Converts the specified color long to an ARGB color int.
Returns a string representation of the object.
Creates a new Color instance from an ARGB color int.
Creates a new Color instance from a color long.

values.code: valueOf(r: Float, g: Float, b: Float)
values.desc: Creates a new opaque Color in the ColorSpace.Named#SRGB color space with the specified red, green and blue component values.

values.code: valueOf(r: Float, g: Float, b: Float, a: Float)
values.desc: Creates a new Color in the ColorSpace.Named#SRGB color space with the specified red, green, blue and alpha component values.

values.code: valueOf(r: Float, g: Float, b: Float, a: Float, colorSpace: ColorSpace)
values.desc: Creates a new Color in the specified color space with the specified red, green, blue and alpha component values.
Creates a new Color in the specified color space with the specified component values.
